Directions: Arrange potatoes in a greased shallow 2-qt. baking dish; sprinkle with cheese. In a bowl, combine soup, paprika and pepper; spread over cheese. Cover and bake at 400 degrees F for 45 minutes. Uncover; bake 10 minutes longer or until potatoes are tender.
Ingredients: 1 (10.75 ounce) can  condensed cream of mushroom soup, undiluted
